Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20673 affecting package crash for versions less than 9.0.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-20673 affecting package crash for versions less than 9.0.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package crash is earlier than 9.0.0-1, affected by CVE-2018-20673
